name: Apocalypse Encounter
description:
This BL project was supposed to be a spooktober 2021 VN Jam, but was delayed so I submitted it to Devtober Jam.

A devastating event left the world in ruins, with zombies roaming everywhere. As Damian struggled to survive, he was saved by Cain, his highschool crush. Cain took him in and promised to bring him somewhere safe. What can Damian do to keep his secret covered? Is  Cain's intention as innocent as it seem?

The game is still a work in progress. The Demo contains:

- 2.5k words

-4 CG ( 3 fully rendered and 1 sketch)

Warning: flashing image, violence, blood and death ( in full version)

The team:

- Script, CG, BG, sprites by Saitoki

- Proofread by Kusoneko
